byline.contributor: Khalid Alokozay contributed reporting from Jalalabad, Afghanistan.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: An American spokesman said the military was investigating reports of civilian casualties in the strike in the Islamic State stronghold of Achin district, in Nangarhar Province.
snippet: An American spokesman said the military was investigating reports of civilian casualties in the strike in the Islamic State stronghold of Achin district, in Nangarhar Province....

headline.main: American Airstrike Killed Afghan Civilians, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: U.S. Drones Hit Civilians, U.N. Says
